Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.game.blackjack.Card

  • public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    Card Class has the following variables: suit, value, name, isAce (check if Ace), and cardNumber (set to face if greater than 10)
    Version:
    2014.02.27
    Author:
    Brian Wan, Fanny Kuang, Eric Palyan

    • Constructor Detail

      • Card

        public Card(int value,
            java.lang.String suit)
        Parameters:
        value - int, value of card, between 1 and 13, if greater than 10 it is set to 10
        suit - String, suit of card, either Hearts, Clubs, Spades, or Diamonds
